attributes.action: Keep the Low Emission Zone as it is.
attributes.additional_details: Only big company who have lots of money will benefit from this. Someone who is trying to make something of their life and work hard to provide for say his/her family will have to result in a change of job or driving for someone else. This will kill opportunitys and gradually kill the Lorry industry.
attributes.background: Being surrounded by the lorry industry my whole life and having family who have their own vehicles and can not afford to buy new Euro 6 vehicles this will gradually put smaller business out of business.

rejection.details:
We're not sure which Low Emission Zone you are concerned about. Low Emission Zones are usually the responsibility of local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
